name: Pushup Bot
description: Slack Bot that says when it's time to do pushups

START_TIME.description: The time of day that the first pushups shall be done, including time zone. E.g. '09:25 US/Eastern'

PERIOD_MINUTES.description: The length of the period between sets.

END_TIME.description: No notices will be posted at or after this time. E.g. '17:30'

ACTIVE_WEEKDAYS.description: List of weekdays that notices will be sent. All weekdays are 'UMTWRFS'.

SLACK_API_TOKEN.description: Real-time messaging API Token. Create a new bot here: https://slack.com/apps/new/A0F7YS25R-bots

SLACK_CHANNEL.description: Name of the channel to post to. Currently this bot is very narrow-minded and will only post here. You must invite them to the channel.
